title: List of all Android gallery  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android gallery  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-Image-Cropper
repoList.description: Image Cropping Library for Android, optimized for Camera / Gallery.

repoList.name: PhotoPicker
repoList.description: An android library to pick photo from gallery

repoList.name: PickPhotoSample
repoList.description: Photo Picker Of Android Library

repoList.name: ByakuGallery
repoList.description: An open source Android library that allows the visualization of large images with gesture capabilities

repoList.name: ZGallery
repoList.description: Android 3rd party library to make implementing galleries more easier

repoList.name: subsampling-scale-image-view
repoList.description: Android library (AAR). Highly configurable, easily extendable deep zoom view for displaying huge images without loss of detail. Perfect for photo galleries, maps, building plans etc.

repoList.name: truffle-shuffle
repoList.description: An Android data-driven, percentage-based UI Card Gallery Library

repoList.name: ChiliPhotoPicker
repoList.description: Photo picker library for android. Let's you pick photos directly from files, or navigate to camera or gallery.

repoList.name: multiple-media-picker
repoList.description: An android library to pick multiple images and/or videos from built-in gallery. :camera: :gem: :boom:

repoList.name: Louvre
repoList.description: A small customizable library useful to handle an gallery image pick action built-in your app. :sunrise_over_mountains::stars:
